long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlighting a player's name in your web browser and clicking the extension allows you to search for an athlete's profile on several Sports Reference sites. Use this to quickly learn more about a player you are unfamiliar with, or win an argument on the internet by readily verifying a player's statistics.
